Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates

Class PlayerTurnPlayState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates.PlayerTurnPlayState
public class PlayerTurnPlayState extends GameState
Represents the game state where players can place cards on the field if it's their turn. This state handles the placement of cards on the game board.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(InGamePlayer target, GenericPair<Integer,Integer> coordinates, PlayableCard card, Side playedSide) throws UnexpectedPlayerException, CardNotInHandException, NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidCardPositionException
      Handles the action of a player placing a card on the game board during their turn. Verifies the target player, card position, and side, then places the card accordingly.
      Overrides:
      placeCard in class GameState
      Parameters:
      target - The player performing the place action.
      coordinates - The coordinates on the game board where the card is to be placed.
      card - The card to be placed.
      playedSide - The side of the card to be played (FRONT or BACK).
      Throws:
      UnexpectedPlayerException - If the player attempting to place a card is not the current player.
      CardNotInHandException - If the specified card is not in the player's hand.
      NotEnoughResourcesException - If the player does not have enough resources to place the card.
      InvalidCardPositionException - If the specified card position on the board is invalid.

    • playerDisconnected

      public void playerDisconnected(InGamePlayer target)
      Handles the action when a player disconnects during their turn. Immediately transitions to the next game state, skipping their action.
      Specified by:
      playerDisconnected in class GameState
      Parameters:
      target - The player who disconnected.

    • transition

      public void transition()
      Handles the transition to the next state after the current player's turn. Checks the game state and conditions to determine the next state after the play phase. If no cards can be drawn or the current player is disconnected, transitions to the next play phase. If the final counter has reached the end, transitions to the victory calculation state.
      Specified by:
      transition in class GameState

    • checkNoCardsToDraw

      public boolean checkNoCardsToDraw()
      Checks if there are no cards left to draw from any deck or placed resources.
      Returns:
      true if there are no cards left to draw, false otherwise.
